import React,{useEffect,useState} from 'react' import "./UserInfo.css" import titleImg from "../../assets/Img/UserInfo/user.png" import useInfoHook from "../../Hooks/UserInfo/useInfoHook" import UserInfoApi from '../../assets/Api/UserInfo/UserInfoApi' import left from "../../assets/Img/UserInfo/left-arrow.png" import right from "../../assets/Img/UserInfo/right-arrow.png" const UserInfo = () => { const { getUsers, getAdmins, pageNum, setPageNum, goLeft, goRight, user, setUser, show, setShow, showUser, showAdmin, totalPage, setTotalPage } = useInfoHook(); useEffect( async ()=>{ show ? ( getUsers(pageNum).then((res)=>{ setUser(res.data.users); setTotalPage(res.data.totalPages); }) ):( getAdmins(pageNum).then((res)=>{ setUser(res.data.users); setTotalPage(res.data.totalPages); }) ) },[pageNum,show]) return(
정보 보기
{showUser()}}> 유저
{showAdmin()}}> 어드민
{ user.map((data)=>( <> )) }
프로필 이메일 이름 역할 삭제여부
{data.profileImage ? ():( )} {data.email} {data.name} {data.role}
삭제
{goLeft(pageNum)}} > 이전
{pageNum+1}
{goRight(pageNum,totalPage)}}> 다음
) } export default UserInfo;
